Blacknightmare::

Blacknightmare ddidn't show emotion, but she knew what he had wanted 
to say. She quickly smiled when she heard the last Orchestra's 
setence. 

"So... Do you have brothers?" said the femme.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra/Composer::
> 
>         Orchestra smiled.
> 
>           "Well, thank you for the compliment, but I'm sure you'd 
find my
> brother Symphony even nicer" he said, but then his smile turned 
into a small
> frown, then into an expression of hope.
> 
>             "I know my brothers are out there!  And when I find 
them, we can
> leave this plan-" Orchestra paused, and looked at Blacknightmare.  
He
> would've said "leave this planet", but then he changed his mind.  
He was
> already enjoying just being a newbie to the Predacons and meeting 
this
> spectacular fem-bot.
> 
>          "Then we can leave our troubles behind," He redid his 
sentence.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>           Composer looked at Wheeljack.
> 
>            "Well, if we got eveeything, let's get to work!"  He said
> hartily.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> =="Brother!  Join the Alliance!  It is the path to victory!"    -
Composer,
> convincing Orchestra to join him-
> 
> (This quote is NOT part of my roleplay, every now-and-then I will 
post
> little quotes that have been made by my chars, this one is 
different because
> none of them have said it :):))
